function.name: t4dm_store
function.description: Store a memory in T4DM. Use this to persist important information, learnings, or experiences for future retrieval.

content.description: The content to store as a memory

metadata.description: Optional metadata to attach to the memory

user_id.description: Optional user identifier for memory isolation

function.name: t4dm_search
function.description: Search memories in T4DM using semantic similarity. Returns the most relevant memories matching the query.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

function.name: t4dm_get
function.description: Get a specific memory by its ID.

memory_id.description: The unique identifier of the memory to retrieve

function.name: t4dm_delete
function.description: Delete a memory by its ID.

memory_id.description: The unique identifier of the memory to delete

function.name: t4dm_consolidate
function.description: Trigger memory consolidation, which strengthens important memories and prunes weak ones. Mimics biological sleep-based memory consolidation.

mode.description: Consolidation intensity: light (quick), deep (thorough), full (complete reorganization)
